title: How to port function names from one exe to another?
content:
I have two 64 bit elf files for one program but with 2 different version.
IDA can resolve the function names in one of them while not for the other.
I don't have bindiff but I want an automatic solution like this tool if available

answers_data.content:
You can try and use Diaphora. It is open source, and is probably the best Bindiff alternative out there.
That said, be aware that binary diffing might fail in many cases regardless of the tools used.

comments.text: In addition to Diaphora, here are several more diff'ing tools: woodmann.com/collaborative/tools/index.php/â€¦
